description: Inject planning workflow reminder on user prompt submission

hooks.command: echo '{"systemMessage": "<system-reminder>If the user is asking a question rather than requesting implementation, respond directly and offer to create a plan if relevant. For implementation requests: if no plan exists or the previous plan is complete, use EnterPlanMode to gather requirements and design an approach before writing code. Use AskUserQuestion to clarify ambiguities. Only implement after explicit user approval.</system-reminder>"}'
